dcterms:creator: K. Ito
dcterms:description: The LJ speech dataset contains approximately 24 hours of audio recorded in a home environment with a sampling rate of 22.05 kHz. It includes 13,100 utterances from a female speaker.
dcterms:title: LJ Speech Dataset

dcterms:creator: P. Warden
dcterms:description: The Speech Commands dataset (SC09) contains many spoken words by thousands of speakers under various recording conditions, including some very noisy environments. The subset used contains spoken digits (0-9) with 31,158 training utterances, totaling approximately 8.7 hours.
dcterms:title: Speech Commands Dataset (SC09)
